hero.headline: A 32" smart board game table with endless classics built in.
hero.description: Infinity Game Table delivers a 32-inch HD touchscreen, Wi-Fi library of Hasbro classics, and tactile feedback so every roll, card, and puzzle feels real—no missing pieces, no setup time.

detailHtml:
32-inch digital game table that stays tidy and ready

Pick it up, plug it in, and play—Hasbro classics, party hits, and puzzles on a 32" HD touchscreen with Dynamic Zoom, tactile feedback, and zero cleanup.

Instant setup

Detachable legs or tabletop mode in seconds.

Built-in library

Hundreds of licensed titles, no boxes to store.

Online + local

Safe Connect for remote friends, great on-couch too.

Couch-to-table in one move

Roomy 32" surface for 4–6 players, with anti-glare finish for bright rooms.

Dynamic Zoom for every player

Personalized views keep cards and tiles clear—no leaning or crowding.

Feels physical

Tactile feedback on rolls, moves, and button presses keeps gameplay grounded.

32" HD display

High-res, anti-glare screen keeps boards, cards, and comics crisp.

Flexible furniture fit

Use as coffee table or place on any flat surface with detachable legs.

Simple power & controls

Plugs into AC, clean controls so anyone can start a session quickly.

Deep library built in

Hundreds of titles ready to play—no app installs, no stacks of boxes.

Always something new

Curated categories and updates keep kids, guests, and regulars entertained.

Arrives protected

Foam-packed for safe delivery; plug in, connect Wi-Fi, and start playing.

guarantee.title: Play it risk-free for 30 days
guarantee.description: If the Infinity Game Table 32" doesn't transform your game nights, return it within 30 days for a full refund—no missing-piece fees, no hassle.
bullets: Free EU shipping and easy returns
Account sync keeps purchases if you upgrade later
guarantee.note: Cancel anytime within 30 days for a full refund

comments.headline: Families use it for game night, puzzles, and remote play
comments.description: Real buyers who replaced stacks of boxes with one digital table. Reviews refresh live so you see the latest sessions.
comments.activity: 5 fresh 5-star reviews posted in the last 4 minutes
activityMessages: Lina in Berlin started a 6-player Monopoly session
Zane in Paris downloaded Scrabble and Clue
Emma in Dublin joined a remote trivia game

reviews.name: Marcus Reed | Board game dad
reviews.content: No more hunting for missing pieces. Kids tap in, I host trivia for the family, and we save the game when bedtime hits.

reviews.name: Sophie Lang | Interior designer
reviews.content: Looks clean as a coffee table and doubles as a digital puzzle board. Anti-glare screen means no glare from windows.

reviews.name: Leo Martins | Remote uncle
reviews.content: I play Candy Land with my niece over Wi-Fi. Safe Connect keeps the table invite-only, which I appreciate.

reviews.name: Harper Quinn | Teacher
reviews.content: We use it for classroom brain breaks—puzzles, fast card games, and no cleanup. Tactile feedback is surprisingly good.

reviews.name: Jenna Cole | Puzzle enthusiast
reviews.content: Dynamic Zoom lets everyone see their corner of the puzzle without hovering. Saving progress is a lifesaver.

reviews.name: Tom Alvarez | Retro gamer
reviews.content: Feels like a modern arcade tabletop. Library updates keep adding games—we're never out of options on game night.

faq.question: Q1. Do I need subscriptions for the games?
faq.answer: A curated pack of Hasbro classics is included. Additional titles are available in the app store—many are free, some are paid.

faq.question: Q2. Can I play offline?
faq.answer: Yes. Downloaded games work offline for local play. Online multiplayer and library updates require Wi-Fi.

faq.question: Q3. Does it include legs?
faq.answer: Yes. Detachable legs are in the box. You can remove them to place the table on any flat surface.

faq.question: Q4. What are the dimensions?
faq.answer: Assembled size is 21.5" x 33.5" x 22.2". Screen is 32" with anti-glare finish.
